item.title: Receptionist / Administrator | Whitfield Business Hub
item.description:
Receptionist / Administrator | Whitfield Business Hub

Are you ready for a new challenge? Whitfield Business Hub is looking for a fun, committed and motivated Receptionist/Facilities Coordinator to join our family! Working in the Virgin Way (we're big fans of Richard Branson here), we provide the very best in customer service to our clients and are looking for a new face to join us.

item.title: Recruiting When your Company has a Bad Reputation - Recruitment Buzz
item.description:
Recruiting When your Company has a Bad Reputation - Recruitment Buzz

Attracting new talent is a piece of cake if your company has a sterling reputation in the industry and is associated with driving innovation or hosting industry leaders. But what happens if that's not the case? Company reputation plays a key role in recruitment - even in tough economy, many unemployed people would never consider working for someone with a bad reputation.

item.title: Jaguar Land Rover to Create 'Hundreds' of Jobs with £450m Investment in Midlands Factory - Recruitment Buzz
item.description:
Jaguar Land Rover to Create 'Hundreds' of Jobs with £450m Investment in Midlands Factory - Recruitment Buzz

Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) will double the size of its engine factory in the Midlands, reinforcing its position as one of the biggest investors in UK manufacturing. The investment of £450m (€641.1m, $681.1m) will flow into JLR's Wolverhampton plant that makes ultra-low emission, four-cylinder diesel engines for models such as the Jaguar XE.

item.title: Recruitment Data Round Up: What, When, Why And How
item.description:
Recruitment Data Round Up: What, When, Why And How

'Recruitment Data: What, When, Why And How', was the very last In-house Recruitment Network breakfast of 2015, and it was an absolute pleasure to share it with event partners, Broadbean Technology. The final breakfast event of the year united just over 30 in-house recruitment professionals, all of whom were keen for an education on the world of recruitment data and how to take advantage of it.

item.title: Logistics Manager Vacancy, Heswall, Wirral | Whitfield Business Hub
item.description:
Logistics Manager Vacancy, Heswall, Wirral | Whitfield Business Hub

Our customers expect to be wowed - at every interaction with us. Whether it's an email, a phone call or an engineer inspection, we give 110% to ensure extreme customer satisfaction. We don't do average. We're all about doing things smarter and more efficiently.

item.title: Best practice tips for keeping up-to-date on recruitment law
item.description:
Best practice tips for keeping up-to-date on recruitment law

Being knowledgeable about recruitment law is essential, whether you work on permanent, contract or temporary placements, and no matter which sector you work in. But how can you keep on top of all the changes? We sat down with Lewina Farrell, Head of Professional Services at the REC, to get her best practice tips for staying up-to-date on recruitment law.

item.title: REC and DWP renew Partnership Agreement to help tackle full employment challenge
item.description:
REC and DWP renew Partnership Agreement to help tackle full employment challenge

The Recruitment and Employment Confederation (REC) welcomes Employment Minister Priti Patel MP today (Wednesday 18th November) to resign a partnership agreement between the REC and the Department of Work and Pensions (DWP).

item.title: Fifty-one recruiters in the running for IRP Awards
item.description:
Fifty-one recruiters in the running for IRP Awards

The Recruitment and Employment Confederation (REC) has today published the shortlist for nine individual categories in the 2015 Institute of Recruitment Professionals (IRP) Awards. The individual shortlist follows the announcement of the company shortlist made in late September.

item.title: Revenue and recruiter numbers up as industry has best year ever
item.description:
Revenue and recruiter numbers up as industry has best year ever

Total recruitment industry turnover increased by 9.7 per cent in 2014/15 to reach £31.5 billion. Growth was delivered by improved margins in the permanent market and increased volumes of temporary, contract and interim placements.

item.title: Lack of capacity could hold back UK firms - REC
item.description:
Lack of capacity could hold back UK firms - REC
